nodes.text:
Yliri Consta was a Hapan female who lived on Dathomir in the aftermath of the Second Galactic Civil War, and was the sister of holodrama actress Sarita Consta. When Han and Leia Solo arrived on Dathomir looking for Luke and Ben Skywalker, they hired Consta to be their lead driver.
Dyon Stadd suspected her of having feelings for Carrack.
